div.head: 四肢厥急
div.div: recession with tension in the four limbs

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: recession with tension in the four limbs

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with si zhi ju ji 四肢拘急 , cramps and tension of the four limbs. Possibly a writing error in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu dan 豕膽 quoting from the Zhu jie shang han lun 註解傷寒論 7 : 吐已下斷，汗出而厥，四肢拘急不解，脈微欲絕者，通脈四逆加豬膽 汁湯主之 , “When the vomiting has ended and the discharge has been halted, while [the patient continues] to sweat [in a manner] associated with recession, so that the four limbs are cramped with tension, and the [movement in the] vessels is so weak that it is at the brink of being cut off, then the ‘decoction to penetrate the vessels in the case of counterflow in the four [limbs]’ with added hog bile will control this”, writes: 霍亂病吐下已斷，汗出而厥，四肢厥急，脈微欲絶 者，通脈四逆湯加豬膽汁主之 , “When in the treatment of cholera, the vomiting and the discharge have been halted, while [the patient continues] to sweat [in a manner] associated with recession, so that the four limbs have recession with tension , and the [movement in the] vessels is so weak that it is at the brink of being cut off, then the ‘decoction to penetrate the vessels in the case of counterflow in the four [limbs] with added hog bile’ will master this”. Si zhi jue leng 四肢厥冷 , recession with cold in the four limbs [4]

Illness Sign identical with si zhi ni leng 四肢逆冷 , counterflow with cold in the four limbs. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 9: 唇青面黑，四肢厥冷，其脈沉細緊數 , “The lips are greenish-blue, the face is black. There is recession with cold in the four limbs . The [movement in the] vessels is in the depth, fine, tight, and frequent”.
